title: Nice Affordable Studio! Prime Location in Lakeview
posting_body: Call/text Max with the Apartment Guys at 630-405-8540 with reference number #2193099.

This elevator-equipped, modern 14-story apartment building offers a lovely rehabbed kitchen with updated appliances, hardwood floors, a business center, a fitness room, and an onsite laundry facility.
Wall-to-wall windows in the apartments let in lots of natural light.
You’ll enjoy proximity to the city’s largest park, Lincoln Park, the lakefront, and cats are welcome!
There is parking on-site as well.
**Prices subject to change, pictures may be of similar unit**
